short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show direction notation above the numpad notation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are a novice for a fighting game, you might not recognize the numpad notation in the discussion easily, like this 236HP, 41236HP, 623LP, 32146LP.

This extension can add direction notation above on numpad notation quickly, just select them and click "Show direction".
